text: Hello Jenkins, we've been mining in Ore City for so long and only now we've found the source of gold
left_text: Sounds too good to be true
right_text: That's a great start of the day

text: Our company, Goldrush Co, discovered that the roots of the Giant Tree are made of gold
We've secured exclusive right to mine this gold, but they foced onto us working with this geologist
left_text: Slow down and let's understand better

text: It's actually "arborist", Dagon. Nice to meet you, my name is Quinn and I am an expert on trees
left_text: You'll have to explain to me

text: My job is to understand as much as possible about the roots of the Giant Tree and make sure mining doesn't threaten the tree or our city
left_text: How can we do this without breaking something?
right_text: We can show you once we take them out
